text: (SAGE) ESP is not always reliable or easy to use. You retire to a quiet corner of the room and meditate, clearing your mind of all distractions. The sublime strains of the falutist's music help you to focus and channel your thoughts into "the space between thought" where all your psionic abilities become operational. You reach out with your mind, scanning the thoughts of those in the room. Obviously Balhazar has anticipated this strategy, because you discover he has placed a blanketing spell on all the guests.

variables: You detect no thoughts from anyone present apart from those of your colleagues.
You detect no thoughts from anyone present.
But wait. You *do* pick up one set of thoughts -- from a saturnine man dressed in a dark-blue cloak and a horned blue mask.
